info.description: TODO: Please specify the description of this service
info.title: QuickBooks Integration Service Service API

get.summary: Get Account Mapping by Account ID
get.description: Retrieves the Account Mapping of an associated Account.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: ID of the Account

post.summary: Create Account Mapping by Account ID
post.description: Creates an account mapping for the associated account.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: ID of the Account

parameters.name: accountMapping
parameters.description: accountMapping

patch.summary: Update/Patch Account mapping by Account ID
patch.description: Patch the Account mapping specified by the Account ID provided in the URI. The only field that can be updated is the `key` field.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: ID of the Account

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: A JSON Patch to update an existing key in Account Mapping

get.description: Retrieves all Accounts from the QuickBooks API using existing Quickbooks authorization. Quickbooks authorization must be stored for this endpoint to work.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

put.description: Requests and stores credentials from QuickBooks, to be used for service operations.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: intuitInfo
parameters.description: intuitInfo

delete.description: Deletes current QuickBooks credentials from the system.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

get.description: Retrieves and formats the URL for UI to present a login flow.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

get.description: Retrieves the status of the QuickBooks integration under the given tenant/entity combo.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

createdOn.description: When the Account Mapping was created.

mappedAccountCode.description: Account number for the account in QuickBooks.

mappedAccountLabel.description: Name for the account in QuickBooks.

titanAccountId.description: The Account ID for the Account Mapping relation.

updatedOn.description: When the Account Mapping was last modified.

message.description: The message accompanying the current status. May contain details from errors received from QuickBooks.

status.description: The code indicating the status of the authorization.

AuthorizationStatusV1.description: The body to use when retrieving the status of a QuickBooks authorization.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

authorizationCode.description: The authorization code Intuit has granted from the user successfully logging in. Can be exchanged for an auth token and refresh token

realmId.description: The Realm Id representing the company in QuickBooks.

QuickBooksInfoV1.description: The body to use when sending in the auth code for QuickBooks integration.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.
